files.patch:
@@ -143,0 +143,20 @@
+$(BUILDTESTDIR)/verifyexclude.match.format.1.ok: \
+                $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
+		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/javatest.jar
+	$(RM) $(@:%.ok=%/work) $(@:%.ok=%/report)
+	$(MKDIR) -p $(@:%.ok=%)
+	$(JDKHOME)/bin/java \
+		-Djavatest.regtest.showCmd=true \
+		-jar $(JTREG_IMAGEJARDIR)/jtreg.jar \
+		-w:$(@:%.ok=%/work) \
+		-r:$(@:%.ok=%/report) \
+		-match:$(TESTDIR)/verifyexclude/ProblemList/format.1.txt \
+		-verifyexclude \
+		$(TESTDIR)/verifyexclude \
+		> $(@:%.ok=%/log 2>&1) \
+	    && (cat $(@:%.ok=%/log) ; exit 1) \
+		|| (exit 0)
+	$(GREP) -s "Must follow:" $(@:%.ok=%/log 2>&1)
+	$(GREP) -s "The fully qualified test must exists." $(@:%.ok=%/log 2>&1) && exit 1 || exit 0
+	echo $@ passed at `date` > $@
+
